Reviews.Title: “Dreadful.... Dirty wouldn't recommend even to an enemy !!!”
Reviews.Author: Juliej61
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in many motels , but this would be the worst one . It was filthy !! Mould all over shower curtain , dirt not dust over bed head and furniture , all lamps broken ... And no light globes in any and when we first used the bathroom the door fell off !!! Bedspreads dirty , didn't sleep a wink all night ... This motel needs to be assessed by someone very soon !!

Reviews.Title: “FRIENDLY SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: Charlie K
Reviews.Content: We were driving through the area on our way to the south coast, last minute we decided to take a break, we booked in and had a good nights sleep, the kids had a swim in the pool in the morning, the houskeeping girls were very friendly we asked for additional towels, tea & coffee they were attentative. The accommodation was good value and a nice break from driving. Would definately stay again.

Reviews.Title: “handy location - budget style”
Reviews.Author: jenny b
Reviews.Content: We made a booking through wotif.com the price was reasonable. We were expecting basic style accommodation, we chose the location as we needed to be relatively close to Vision Eye Institute Hurstville Clinic as I had an early appointment for laser surgery for the following morning. The staff were friendly and helpful, the rooms older style, clean bed linen & towels, basic facilities and considering the highway location not too noisy. We were able to leave our car in their car-park for the day, reception arranged for a taxi. Overall very pleasant experience, excellent location.

Reviews.Title: “PLEASE DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY - DO NOT STAY HERE!!!”
Reviews.Author: Debbie E
Reviews.Content: Ohh how I wish I had found this website before I booked a room at the Blakehurst Motor Inn! We recently took a road trip to the Gold Coast and looked for cheap and cheerful accommodation along the way. This place was cheap but by no stretch of the imagination was it cheerful. I can only confirm what everyone else has said on this website and the words that spring to mind when I think of the Blakehurst Motor Inn are 's**t hole' (sorry, I don't normally swear but that just about sums it up). We have a 9month old son who we couldn't even put on the floor because it was so filthy. When my husband complained and asked if we could move to another room he was given keys to another room that was actually worse than the one we were in and all the lady on reception could say was " well the hotel is quite old". I don't understand how places like this are allowed to stay open, in my opinion it should be closed down!!!! We couldn't get out of there quick enough.

Reviews.Title: “Filthy and Disgusting!Can't beleive this place is allowed to stay open.”
Reviews.Author: niznikrose
Reviews.Content: So filthy, we could not even think about sitting down on the lounge or taking off our shoes on the stained and filthy carpet. The walls were stained and drawn on. Large dead spider on floor of bedroom. Appliances did not work, power points faulty and dangerous. Cracked tiles in bathroom, mould on ceilings. DO NOT STAY, UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES...

Reviews.Title: “not fit for animals”
Reviews.Author: holidayhappy57
Reviews.Content: This hotel was disgusting that bad we couldn't even stay & instead travelled 3hrs home after our full day & night social engagement.Carpets thread bare,stained & wet curtains ripped, falling off rails & filthy. Staff couldn't care 2 hoots about anything. In all a pigs stye & not fit for animals let alone humans. Kissed my money goodbye but our heallth was more important

Reviews.Title: “Should be condemned”
Reviews.Author: taleit
Reviews.Content: I have never been so digusted in my life we booked 4 rooms each one worse then the other filthy,holes in walls.dirty walls,broken furniture,mildew on ceiling carpet a danger to your feet .The room stunk asked for spray deoderant which we used constantly.Couldn't move as there was no where else to go.I forgot to mention the live in cockroaches.

Reviews.Title: “An absolute dive. Don't do it !!!!”
Reviews.Author: BordoNsw
Reviews.Content: This place is an absolute dump. Filthy rooms, cockroaches, mould on every surface. Broken lamps, terrible TV reception, rude staff who could not have cared less about the state of the place. We rang the owner about the state of the place today and she couldn't have cared less either. We were charged $200 for the family room which is about $199 over priced. I wouldn't let my dog stay there. We have a four month old that we wouldn't let near the floor for fear of her catching something. We took photos of the filth and are reporting it to the health authorities. This has to be the worst hotel in Sydney. NEVER AGAIN.

HotelInfo.Name: Blakehurst Motor Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 513 Princes Hwy | corner Woniora Road, Blakehurst, Sydney, New South Wales 2221, Australia
